title: RST 205
names: Issues in Intercollegiate Athletics: The Big Ten Conference
intro: For more than 120 years THE BIG TEN has set the standard for college sports. This course will take an historical review of the important decisions and policies conference leaders have made to shape and define the league. With insights and analyses from Big Ten executives, the course will critically examine factors and variables that led to the Rose Bowl partnership, conference expansion, the Big Ten Network, and bold initiatives in growing women's sports.
